channel.title: Ethilia - Osrs/Pk/Pvm/Skilling/Eco & Cash Prize Competition!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3scr5Y0.png?1[/img][/center]
[center][size=10pt][color=red][font=Verdana]COMPETITION - WE ARE OFFERING A PRIZE OF $50 TO THE FIRST PLAYER TO ACHIEVE MAXIMUM TOTAL LEVEL! TO BE IN WITH A CHANGE, SIGN UP TODAY! THE WINNER WILL BE CHOSEN ON THE 01/07/16
GOOD LUCK TO ALL WHO COMPETE! [/font][/size][/center]
[center][url=http://www.Ethilia.com]www.Ethilia.com[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.Ethilia.com/forum]www.Ethilia.com/forum[/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/dyffK5f.jpg?2[/img][/center]
[size=20pt][center]Welcome to Ethilia, an economy based server. Here you can battle mighty bosses, slay your enemies and rule! With our ever expanding content you won't ever find yourself scarce of enjoyment. We cater for all styles of game play, Skilling, Pvp, Pvm, Achievement diarys, Dedicated hosting & a passionate team! we have it all! We also have a large variety of minigames, with smooth game play and a dedicated team to fill all of our communities wishes! Being that we are in the early stages of development please kindly leave suggestions or information related bugs on the forum. Join us today at www.ethilia.com
Ethilia Development team.[/center]
[b][i][font=Verdana]We are also currently recruiting developers, if you would like to get involved please send me an email at Admin@ethilia.com[/font][/i][/b]

item.title: Ethilia - Osrs/Pk/Pvm/Skilling/Eco & Cash Prize Competition!
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

You are doing a contest where a player can earn money, and you are selling credits so people can purchase items to give them an unfair advantage. This is NOT a fair competition! :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Ethilia - Osrs/Pk/Pvm/Skilling/Eco & Cash Prize Competition!
item.dc:creator: @DukeDice DukeDice
item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

What do you mean chosen? surely whoever gets max level first is the winner? no need to choose…
